post.title: EdgeHawk?
post.content: I got an email this morning from Richard Veryard wondering if I should now be called EdgeHawk. That’s funny. Alas, EdgeHawk.com is “Your #1 internet Hoosier Racing Tire source” so I think I’m going to stick with DevHawk…at least for now.
post.excerpt: I got an email this morning from Richard Veryard wondering if I should now be called EdgeHawk. That’s funny. Alas, EdgeHawk.com is “Your #1 internet Hoosier Racing Tire source” so I think I’m going to stick with DevHawk…at least for now.

comments.name: Lee "Edge Hawk" Meadows
comments.content:
I’m Edge Hawk, so I think you should keep DevHawk.

Funny how when you google your name looking for something, the things you find.

Lee.
